official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the definition of the term "law enforcement officer" under the Federal Employees' Retirement System.

summary.text: Amends provisions of law comprising the Federal Employees' Retirement System to remove the requirement that a law enforcement officer who is transferred to a supervisory or administrative position must have performed other law enforcement duties for at least ten years.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the definition of the term "law enforcement officer" under the Federal Employees' Retirement System.
